{"model_name": "Cursor", "provider": "Cursor", "version": "1.0", "wrapper": "Cursor"}

```go
func calculate(nums []int, label string, verbose bool) (int, string, error) {
	var total int
	for _, n := range nums {
		if n > 0 {
			total += n
		} else if n < 0 {
			total -= n
		}
	}
	if total == 0 {
		return 0, "", fmt.Errorf("empty result for %s", label)
	}
	return total, "", nil
}
```
